mapper.select:
SELECT t_contacter.contact_name,contact_age,contact_sex,contact_nation,contact_birthpalce, contact_nation_current,contact_place_current,t_company.company_name FROM t_contacter LEFT JOIN t_contacter_company ON t_contacter.id = t_contacter_company.contact_id LEFT JOIN t_company ON t_contacter_company.company_id = t_company.id
t_contacter.logical_del_div = 0
